name: Cubed (Swooplezz)
description:
Cubed is a game where you try to destroy all the cubes by clicking the corresponding color to your cube.

Beware of the bombs: Bombs cause 3 hearts of damage when you start you can buy protection to decrease that amounts.

Behold The Treasure: Chests give you power ups and coins !!

Game Made by - Swooplezz-

"Johnny was here"
